title: The Little ships of England
brief_description: A study of boatbuilding in Britain, tracing the processes of the industry from the oak, ash, and elm forests, to the boat and shipbuilding yards. The film includes a sequence dealing with the part played by little ships in the evacuation of Dunkirk, World War II.
